name: Download Attachments by User Restrictions
author: Aditya

sections.description:
This extension will help you to show attachment with user restrictions. You can add user types and assign your document to them.

How to Use

  • Use this shortcode in editor [attachment id=“1”]
  • Use this code in php <?php echo do_shortcode(‘[attachment id=“1”]’); ?>
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/attachment directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the \’Plugins\’ screen in WordPress
